name: Custom Customer Notes
author: Trustio

sections.description: This is a lightweight plugin for WooCommerce that makes it possible to instant add customer or private notes with predefined messages.
sections.installation:
Installing “Custom Customer Notes for WooCommerce” can be done either by searching for “Custom Customer Notes for WooCommerce” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Custom Customer Notes for WooCoommerce makes custom customer notes in WooCoomerce.
description: This is a lightweight plugin for WooCommerce that makes it possible to instant add customer or private notes with predefined messages.

screenshots.caption: Create custom notes that you frequently send to your customers.
Select if the note should be private or sent to the customer.
